sqls.sql: SELECT T."NO" as shipno, T."POST_NO" as postno, T."ADDRESS1" as address1, T."ADDRESS2" as address2, T."ADDRESS3" as address3, T."NAME" as name, T."TEL" as tel, T."SHIP_CONTENT_DIV" as shipcontentdiv, COALESCE(M."NAME_CN",'') || ' ' || COALESCE(M."COLOR",'') || ' ' || COALESCE(M."SIZE",'') as shipcontent, T."SHIP_COUNT" as shipcount, case when T."SHIP_DIV" = 'C' then 'クリックポスト' when T."SHIP_DIV" = 'Y' then 'ゆうパケット' when T."SHIP_DIV" = 'S' then 'その他' end as shipdiv, T."BIKO" as biko, T."TRACKING_NO" as trackingno, case when T."PAY_STATUS" = '1' then '已支付' when T."STATUS" = '0' then '请求中' when T."STATUS" = '5' then '准备中' when T."STATUS" = '8' then '已发送' when T."STATUS" = '9' then '已取消' end as status, T."PAY_STATUS" as paystatus, T."FEE" as fee, T."FEE_DIV" as feediv, T."AMOUNT" as amount, case when T."PAY_STATUS" = '1' then 4 when T."STATUS" = '0' then 1 when T."STATUS" = '5' then 2 when T."STATUS" = '8' then 3 when T."STATUS" = '9' then 9 end as sortkey FROM "TEMP_発送情報" T LEFT JOIN "MASTER_発送商品マスタ情報5" M ON cast(T."SHIP_CONTENT" as smallint) = M."P_ID" WHERE substring("NO",1,8) >= TO_CHAR(current_date-interval '30 day','yyyymmdd') ORDER BY sortkey

SELECT "NO" as shipno, "POST_NO" as postno, "ADDRESS1" as address1, "ADDRESS2" as address2, "ADDRESS3" as address3, "NAME" as name, "TEL" as tel, "SHIP_CONTENT_DIV" as shipcontentdiv, "SHIP_CONTENT" as shipcontent, "SHIP_COUNT" as shipcount, "SHIP_DIV" as shipdiv, "BIKO" as biko, "TRACKING_NO" as trackingno, case when "PAY_STATUS" = '1' then '已支付' when "STATUS" = '0' then '请求中' when "STATUS" = '5' then '准备中' when "STATUS" = '8' then '已发送' when "STATUS" = '9' then '已取消' end as status, "PAY_STATUS" as paystatus, "FEE" as fee, "FEE_DIV" as feediv, "AMOUNT" as amount FROM "TEMP_発送情報" WHERE "NO"= :shipno

SELECT A."POST_NO" as postno, A."NAME" as name, '様' as sama, A."ADDRESS1" as address1, A."ADDRESS2" as address2, COALESCE(A."ADDRESS3", '') as address3, '' as address4, B."NAME_JP" as shipcontent FROM "TEMP_発送情報" A LEFT JOIN "MASTER_発送商品マスタ情報5" B ON cast(A."SHIP_CONTENT" as smallint) = B."P_ID" WHERE A."STATUS" = '5' AND A."SHIP_DIV" = 'C'
